entities.name: hassan mostafa
entities.description: Chairwizard of the International Association of Quidditch. He is described as a small and skinny wizard with a mustache to rival Uncle Vernon's, wearing robes of pure gold.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Mentioned as having a mustache that Hassan Mostafa's mustache rivals.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Commentating the Quidditch match. He is described as screaming 'Theeeeeeeey're OFF!'

entities.name: mullet
entities.description: One of the teams playing in the Quidditch match.

entities.name: troy
entities.description: Commentator's name mentioned while announcing team names.

entities.name: levski
entities.description: One of the teams playing in the Quidditch match.

entities.name: dimitrov
entities.description: Commentator's name mentioned while announcing team names.

entities.name: moran
entities.description: One of the teams playing in the Quidditch match.

relationships.description: Hassan Mostafa is participating in the Quidditch match as part of team Mullet.
Bagman is commentating the Quidditch match.
Hassan Mostafa is pursuing the Golden Snitch after it was released into the air.
